content: in this legal case in estonia the tartu county court made a final decision after 7 months the details of the case are not mentioned but one party will be responsible for covering the procedural costs the courts decision referred to as court dec has been delivered to the parties involved and entered into force if someone wants to appeal the decision they have 30 days to do so the case involves a divorce between two parties with joint assets including a property valued at 64000 euros the claimant wants to sell the property and divide the proceeds equally while the defendant believes it should be left for public use the court grants the divorce and decides to divide the joint assets as requested by the claimant the procedural costs of the divorce will be borne by both parties while the costs related to the division of joint assets will be borne by the defendant the defendant must pay a portion of the claimants procedural costs based on the code civil procedure section 190 paragraph 3 the defendant has 30 days to pay the specified amount
